resources.string: In this page you can view your daily tasks. Pressing on the plus button you can create a new task to do for today. By clicking in the modify button of the task you can update ,delete or complete it. The completed tasks are in the lower part ot the screen.
In this page you can see your calendar and the tasks you have for each day. Organize yourself adding new tasks through the add task button. Stay OrganizD, stay Foolish!
On this page you can use the Pomodoro timer, with 25 minutes of work and a 5 minute break. If you want you can also listen to 3 pleasant background music. Get some tasks done ðŸ’ª!

On this page you will see your progress within the app. You can see your level based on the completed tasks, you can customize your name and you can set the phone in total focus mode. Try to overcome your limits !!!
OrganizD is an app developed by Andrea Tassi and Endri Sefa, two students of UniversitÃ Politecnica delle Marche. We are : EndriSefa and GitAndreaHub on GitHub. Check our profiles!
The total focus function allows you to silence any notification to improve your concentration. Activate it to put the phone into "Do not disturb" mode.
